attributes.action: Close Universities down for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID19
attributes.additional_details: The government's failure to disclose the location of an increasing number of patients with COVID19 is a serious threat to the spread of the disease. And now the government has no effective protective measures such as wearing masks, grounding flights from affected areas and taking temperature tests for every passenger.
attributes.background: I want the government to call on universities to suspend classes and start online teaching and testing.To strengthen the monitoring and attention to the epidemic situation.
